text:
@PressSec The man you are idolizing has presided over the death of 133,000 Americans!!! I'm sorry .... but I don't think you have a heart. You definitely don't have courage! May God have mercy on your soul. You are complicit!

#PodiumBarbie #KayleighMcEnemy #McEnemy #Trump #COVID19 #GoJoe
